name: Botswald
background: A mysterious figure with a hidden past, this NPC grew up in the shadowy alleys of a bustling cyberpunk metropolis. Their life changed when they discovered their innate ability to manipulate digital realities.
appearance: Tall and lithe, with neon-blue hair and silver cybernetic eyes. Wears a sleek, black exosuit adorned with glowing circuit patterns. A holographic interface flickers around their left arm.
